title: [Large-scale] Distance Education Design and Operational Strategies Utilizing Hypermedia

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology theories and experience with digital teaching tools
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to develop hypermedia-based lesson design skills applicable in actual elementary and secondary school settings.

learning_goals: Learners analyze hypermedia content types (text, images, videos, interactive elements) and effectively integrate them into language education.
When designing mobile-optimized microlearning modules, learners apply principles of hyperlinking, multitasking, and nonlinear learning pathways.
In BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments, learners develop and operate hypermedia-based assessment tools (quizzes, feedback systems) to enhance engagement.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
